name: Torrentday Banner Modified - Dark Theme
description: A nice simple Black theme with a modified banner. read additional info for changes etc..
additional_info:
##Version & Release Date-
Ver: Beta 0.1
Release: 28/01/2012

##Changes & Notes-
-Background Color changed to black
 -Note [I hated the original colour so black to me makes it look a lot better]

-Torrentday Banner Removed
 -Note [I hated the banner changing so decided to remove it ]

-Donations Ad Removed
 -Note [This was a side effect of me removing the Banner]

-Original Banner Added and Modified
 -Note [ Faded sides and bottom of original banner using photoshop cs5.1 ]

##Comment-
Let me know if you find an bugs or if something has been modified that was not shown in the changes.
